abstract: Rupert Murdoch tells Fox News staff that chairman and chief executive Roger Ailes will step down; also says he will serve as head of news organization in interim; Ailes' departure, sparked by sexual harassment suit filed against him by former anchor Gretchen Carlson just 15 days before, is stunning fall for one of most powerful people in media.

byline.original: By JOHN KOBLIN, EMILY STEEL and JIM RUTENBERG
byline.contributor: Michael M. Grynbaum, Brooks Barnes, Ben Protess and Sydney Ember contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Mr. Murdoch himself broke the news to staff members in New York, barely two weeks after Mr. Ailes was named in a sexual harassment suit.

headline.main: Roger Ailes Leaves Fox News, and Rupert Murdoch Steps In
headline.print_headline: As Accusations Build, Murdoch Ushers Ailes Out at Fox News
